flounder.processing.glProcessing

Class GlRequestQueue

  • java.lang.Object
    • flounder.processing.glProcessing.GlRequestQueue

  • public class GlRequestQueue
extends java.lang.Object
    Holds OpenGL requests that are in queue.

      • acceptNextRequest

        public GlRequest acceptNextRequest()
        Returns:
        Returns the next item in queue and then removes it from this list.

      • hasRequests

        public boolean hasRequests()
        Returns:
